key_questions:
com",
"date": "2025-05-02T15:57:00-04:00",
"questions_responses": [
{
"question": "When Rachel signed the plan at the start of the call was that already finalized or was it something still open?",
"response": "A treatment plan is finalized (closed) when the case manager signs it

does that actually get added into the system or how does that work?",
"response": "I had made a note regarding our call on 4/29/2025 and it is indicated in that note that you verbalized not being involved in the treatment planning session

is the old one actually being taken out or just added to?",
"response": "All previous treatment plans remain in the file, however, the most recent treatment plan is always the current and active plan

is there a policy for that before things get signed?",
"response": "No specific policy

if Rachel left early how did they get a full plan from just that?",
"response": "A treatment planning meeting was held on 4/15/2025, which was also the initial meeting between the case manager, Rachel and Ben at Rachel’s home

is that okay or is that something that should have been handled differently?",
"response": "The walk-in does count as a contact, and he also reached out to you on 4/28/2025 to set up the initial visit with you at home
